traits.name: (Scout) Hard to Hit
traits.detail: When you are standing and unrestained, attacks against you have disadvantage unless you are adjacent to two or more enemies.

actions.name: Danse Macabre
actions.detail: Lutheria disengages and attacks three times with her maddening touch.

actions.name: Maddening Touch
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ [18, d8] psychic damage.

actions.name: Lullaby
actions.detail: A creature within 30' of Lutheria must make a DC 19 CON save or fall unconscious. The creature wakes when it takes damage, or when an adjacent creature takes an action to stir it.

actions.name: Invitation to Dance
actions.detail: A creature within 30' must make a DC 22 WIS save or use its action on its next turn to dance uncontrollably.

actions.name: Curtain Call (recharge 5/6)
actions.detail: The emerald scythe descends. Its target must make a DC 22 DEX save or take 100 necrotic damage (half damage on a successful save).
